timeline.bodyText:
I think I'd rather keep the array here and have getPullRequests() return an UnmodifiableList created from it.
Or maybe return an Iterable.
I don't think there's a strong reason to change to a List, but I'm open to discussing it.
timeline.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: I do not have any strong opinions on the need to return an UnmodifiableList / Iterable  vs changing this to a List. Will update 😄
replies.author: JKalash

timeline.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: Ah right, I guess instead of having the method signature return an Iterable we can set it to List specifically? Updated as such.
replies.author: JKalash

timeline.bodyText:
@JKalash
Keep this in mind.  This is took me a while to figure out. I'm not sure if it is expected behavior from GitHub but it is consistent.
timeline.author: bitwiseman
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -105,15 +128,22 @@ public String getHeadSha() {
     /**
      * Gets the pull requests participated in this check run.
      *
-     * @return Pull requests of this check run
+     * Note this field is only populated for events. When getting a {@link GHCheckRun} outside of an event, this is
+     * always empty.

timeline.message:
Populate Check pull requests

Turns out there were quite a few bugs in this area (it was exposed publicly before. Some
tweaking was needed and updates to the tests to show this working as expected.
